ulg.alert.nodoublebackpack: You can't put a backpack in another backpack! Can't close it.
ulg.alert.changedinventory: The inventory of the player and the backpack inventory now switched...
ulg.alert.PACKBUG1: This is not the way to close the backpack. Come back to the game and press the switch button
ulg.alert.checkyourinventory: Check your Inventory! You are now using the Backpack Inventory!
ulg.alert.nobundlesinside: Bundles don't fit in backpacks... Can't close it!
ulg.alert.noshboxesinside: A whole shulker box in a backpack? You can't close it like this.
ulg.alert.still_open: You can't place the backpack there, it's still open!
ulg.alert.oldversionbackpack: This backpack is mouldy. How to open it? HERE is a hint.
ulg.lore.oldversionbackpack: This backpack is old. To be opened, it will need to be refurbished on a working table.
